name: Bionicle: The Legend of Mata Nui
name_original: Bionicle: The Legend of Mata Nui
description:
ego Bionicle: The Legend of Mata Nui is a canceled action-adventure video game developed by Saffire. Based on the Lego Group's Bionicle line of constructible action figures, the game was intended to release on Microsoft Windows computers in late 2001 and the GameCube in early 2002.

Two builds of The Legend of Mata Nui have been made available to the public.
Additionally, you can choose to download the REBUILT mod by Litestone Studios,
which remasters the game with new features and custom content.
